properties.name: target
properties.description: DOM element or CSS selector string. Element, next to which, a dropdown should be opened (usually the element that triggers open)

properties.name: position
properties.description: String. Where dropdown should be placed relatively to the target. Formated as 'primaryAlignment-secondaryAlignment'.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Boolean. Is dropdown shown. Supports .sync modifier that lets the component close itself (when user clicks outside)

properties.name: just-fade-in
properties.description: Change the enter animation to just fade in

properties.name: just-fade-out
properties.description: Change the leave animation to just fade out
